about_the_game:
Welcome to Extreme Racing! Into the world of speed and victory ! In an incredibly cool race that you will appreciate from the first seconds of the launch !

Extreme racing is a wonderful racing game in which you will enjoy spending your time and at the same time test your driving skills in a cool racing mode! If you are attracted to the big magical world of speed and off-scale adrenaline, then the game "Extreme racing" is just for you!

Thanks to the juicy graphics, excellent physics and realistic gameplay, the game will engage you 100% from the very first seconds!
Collect pink checkpoints-checkpoints. Collected 5-congratulations! You've been awarded a lap ! There are 30 levels in total! Drive the car with the arrows and collect the checkpoints as fast as possible and be the first !
And don't forget to collect coins ! After all, thanks to them, you can replenish your fleet with new cool cars ! A total of 9 cars are available.

Impressive ? Then quickly get to the game ! Choose the coolest car, start the engine and step on the gas ! Be the first !

name: Extreme racing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU G530 @2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GSO 512
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU G530 @2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GSO 1024
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

If you are attracted to the big magical world of speed and off-scale adrenaline, then the game "Extreme racing" is just for you!
